lead_paragraph: An article in some editions last Sunday about the W.N.B.A. game between the Liberty and the Indiana Fever included several errors. The surname of the league president is Donna Orender — not Ordener, as it was misspelled in some copies. Ms. Orender said the W.N.B.A.’s attendance, relevance and excitement were on an upward “trending,” not “training.” And the league goes on hiatus for the Beijing Olympics on Monday, not on Aug. 28.
